body:
Ok now with 100% more `.jsx` files linted.

In other news: We don't seem to care about using JSX syntax in `.js` files, and I don't see a lot of reason to have `.jsx` files, besides just confusing tools. @brittanystoroz how do you feel about renaming all the `.jsx` files to `.js`?
body_text:

Ok now with 100% more .jsx files linted.

In other news: We don't seem to care about using JSX syntax in .js files, and I don't see a lot of reason to have .jsx files, besides just confusing tools. @brittanystoroz how do you feel about renaming all the .jsx files to .js?
